definition: in opposition to a civil authority or government, a member of an irregular armed force that fights a stronger force by sabotage and harassment
details:
adjective
- in opposition to a civil authority or government
= synonyms: seditious, subversive
noun
- a member of an irregular armed force that fights a stronger force by sabotage and harassment
= synonyms: guerrilla
- a person who takes part in an armed rebellion against the constituted authority (especially in the hope of improving conditions)
= synonyms: insurrectionist, freedom fighter, rebel
